column2: Panic button-equipped Amazon Kindles join gadget battle SEATTLE Amazon.com Inc has begun selling faster and lighter versions of its Kindle tablet with a unique video helpdesk feature aimed at giving it a leg-up over Apple Inc and Google Inc during the holiday season.
Moelis hires Zhang Xiuping as Asia M&A; head HONG KONG
column3: Sept 27 Independent investment bank Moelis & Co said on Friday it has appointed former Bank of America Corp executive Zhang Xiuping as its head of M&A; for Asia.
